title: Metro Medico
overview: Gu Xiaofeng goes to Haicheng to combat a plague, only to be ambushed and thrown into a lake. In her fading consciousness, she glimpses the silhouette of Ren Yi. When she awakens in the modern world, she resolves to stay by Dr. Ren Yi's side to uncover the truthâ€”thus begins a tale that transcends two worlds.
